name: Put Your Brain On 2
description:
The territory of the castle is in danger and peace must be restored .A strategy is urgently needed!

Put Your Brain On 2 is a casual-puzzle game about thinking and organizing tactics. In the role of commander, you will have to give orders to your subordinates to occupy the necessary attack positions. When everything is ready, you will shoot with something magical that needs to reach the enemy. The shields of the soldiers will be used as a support for this attack.

Only by making the right decisions will it be possible for the castle to no longer be in danger. You need to to find the perfect solution for very level in order to pass the game!

Game features :
- 30 levels
- Several enemies at the same time
- Army management
